detail.Credits: Monique R. (Creative Director), Laura F. (Graphic Designer), Bhushan P. (Senior Designer), This January Agency
detail.Responsibilities: Design Development, Campaign roll-out, Content Design
detail.describe: HABIT is an exciting rebrand of Health by Habit, designed to give the supplement company a fresh and modern look. This rebranding effort aims to enhance the brand's identity and build a stronger connection with its audience. By updating the visual identity and messaging, HABIT seeks to ensure that customers feel a sense of trust and reliability in the products they choose. In this project, I was given the responsibility of developing and launching campaigns across both social media platforms and out-of-home advertising. This involved a strategic approach to creating a cohesive brand presence along with creating various social assets for the brands social media presence through Tiktok, Instagram, LinkedIn. These social assets are designed to convey a youthful and playful vibe that resonates with Gen Z while also instilling a sense of trust and reliability.
detail.name: HABIT SUPPLEMENTS

detail.Credits: Fiona K. (Lead Designer), Kendyl S. (Senior Designer), Laura F.  (Graphic Designer)
detail.Responsibilities: Content Design, Motion Design, Digital Design
detail.describe: Dose & Co is a range of premium ingestible beauty blends that harnesses the power of high-dose collagen peptides, and pairs them with vitamins, nutrients and antioxidants that are designed to deliver results through daily usage. Founded in 2019 by registered nutritionist and naturopath Libby Matthews, the brand offers a sophisticated, recognizable, gender-neutral, and sleek look. I was given the responsibility of creating social assets across both social media platforms , out-of-home advertising, and EDM. Tasked with creating such assets, I developed social media post ideas and cultivated new approaches to better effectively appeal to the target audience. This approach aimed to enhance the brand’s sales and boost its overall visibility by creating appealing assets.
detail.name: DOSE & CO

detail.Credits: Fiona K. (Lead Designer), Laura F. (Graphic Designer), Ethan W. (3D Rendering), Tiny Disco Agency
detail.Responsibilities: Content Design, Motion Design, Digital Design
detail.describe: Health by Habit is a supplement brand owned by Zuru that focuses on creating accessible, high-quality wellness products. The brand aims to simplify health and beauty routines through it’s range of ingestible supplements, emphasising transparency and effectiveness. With a commitment to innovation and appealing to a range of modern consumers, Health by Habit offers products that cater to various wellness needs, all while maintaining a fun and engaging brand personality. In this project, I was tasked with designing assets that could be utilised across various social media platforms (Instagram, Tiktok,Twitter, Linkedin…)  and sales promotions to help boost the brand's sales. I was also responsible for creating various email marketing materials and content for retail sites like Amazon, Target, and Walmart. This helps build strong customer relationships, foster brand loyalty and drive conversions
detail.name: HEALTH BY HABIT

detail.describe: Gingernut’s Angels is a New Zealand-based organization that offers financial support to individuals facing challenging fertility journeys. Founded in 2024 by Jaimee Lupton in memory of her daughter named Gingernut. The charity aims to bring hope and assistance to those navigating infertility. As the lead content designer for this project, I was solely responsible for creating the feed layout and designing content to enhance the charity’s digital presence. Collaborating closely with an illustrator, I developed various creative concepts and illustration assets that align with the organization’s visual identity. These assets were designed to be versatile across platforms, ensuring consistent messaging and emotional impact. Additionally, I focused on optimizing the content strategy to foster engagement, drive donations, and highlight the stories of those supported by Gingernut’s Angels.
detail.name: GINGERNUT’S ANGEL

detail.describe: Dear Mama & Papa is a personal research project that aims to provide individualised listening experiences for Asian immigrant parents and their children to use in order to help them communicate one another’s sentimental feelings and emotions. Users record their messages, which are then stored in a specifically constructed and customised `Memory Box` that can play the audio experience through the built-in speakers. The purpose of this project is to highlight the impact of Dual-Identity on the child of Southeast Asian immigrants through my personal story by creating a tangible platform. This will help enable parents and children to communicate one another's sentimental feelings and emotions in a way that is not speaking face to face making it simpler.
detail.name: DEAR MAMA & PAPA

detail.approach: Ezyair- a service that fully engages with potential air taxi passengers to book and organized their trips in a simple and easy manner. Our goal is to minimize problems with convenience within a single service, giving adequate information to customers about the booking process and their overall trip experience.
detail.brief: For this project, the brief told us to design and produce an innovative concept, motion identity, and creative media strategy for a new enterprise.
detail.describe: Red Bull Basement empowers student innovators to create tech solutions for positive change, offering insights from prominent change-makers. Representing New Zealand, Bethany and John introduced Testament, a smartpen that monitors a person's health while transforming handwritten letters into digital format. Receiving the message and information via an app enables distant family members not only to connect but to better track the condition of their elderly relatives. This conceptualised product was developed to bring back the emotions and flavour of handwritten messages compared to a simple text message.
detail.name: TESTAMENT (RBB NATIONAL WINNER)

title.content: Bethany Tran is a junior multidisciplinary  designer based in Aoteroa, New Zealand.  Driven by purposeful design, striving for  functionality intertwined with emotional depth.
